attributes.action: Make drivers who do not indicate when maneuvering on a roundabout take thier test again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Countless times I have seen drivers maneuver on roundabouts with little consideration for any one else. Unfortunately the average British person is not granted with a level 2 or above skill in clarevoyancy which in some cases would help us predict where these people a going. It is about time people were punished for this CRIME and justice for the law abiding citizens of this land.
So Prime minister it is time to bring them back into the Driving schools and address this behaviour with re-tests.
